thread.title: Split’s Jessica Sula on Her First New York Fashion Week
thread.title_full: Split’s Jessica Sula on Her First New York Fashion Week

title: Split’s Jessica Sula on Her First New York Fashion Week

organizations.name: first new york fashion week split

text: Split ’s Jessica Sula Says She’s Addicted to Fashion Week February 16, 2017 11:15 PM by Edward Barsamian Photo: Getty Images As the breakout star of the horror film Split , Jessica Sula enjoyed this week some of the privileges that come with Hollywood celebrity: namely, a front row seat at New York Fashion Week . “I have never attended Fashion Week so it was all a pretty absorbing experience,” said the 22-year-old actress. “Fashion Week was explained to me as ‘constantly moving’—maybe quite hectic at some points, but exciting. I was surprised how all that energy got me totally addicted to watching the shows.” Sula took in two shows—Dion Lee and Jenny Packham—which reflected the actress’s taste for international labels. “I enjoyed the elegant cuts of Jenny Packham and [the] edge of Dion Lee,” said Sula. “It was so amazing to get to meet the designers [and] my favorite part was getting to see it all for the first time.” But did anyone elude the rising star? “I have a girl crush on the captivating Jourdan Dunn,” admitted Sula, adding, “but my [designer] crush has to be everything Zac Posen.” As for her front row wardrobe, Sula is all about prim practicality. “There are some lovely Grey Jason Wu outfits I have that always make me feel very stylish but simple. A good pair of boots paired with my vintage Max Mara coat, and comfortable and stylish Via Spiga Mary Jane heels.” Anything still on her Fashion Week hit list? “I heard Marc Jacobs’s show is pretty spectacular. Hopefully, I will be able to go one of these days.” Recommended For You
